Title: Miss BS
Writer: Sean Clements, Dominic Dierkes, Blake Anderson (creator), Adam DeVine (creator), Anders Holm (creator), Kyle Newacheck (creator), Connor Pritchard (creator), Dominic Russo (creator), Dominic Dierkes (story), Sean Clements (story)
Actors: Blake Anderson, Adam DeVine, Anders Holm, Erik Griffin
Plot: When the guys encounter a television journalist who exposes scams they put the entire office in jeopardy.
